data.title: Le Cinema Notre Metier by FEYDER, JACQUES & FRANCOISE ROSAY: Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Soft cover - Paris Skira 1944 - First Edition. Text in French. Signed and inscribed by Francois Rosay, actress of the French and international stage and screen. She was married to director Jacques Feyder, with whom this book of memoirs was written. Paperbound. Slight wear to the edges, else very good in printed wrappers. Illustrated. - Le Cinema Notre Metier
data.text:

View this seller's items

About this Item

First Edition. Text in French. Signed and inscribed by Francois Rosay, actress of the French and international stage and screen. She was married to director Jacques Feyder, with whom this book of memoirs was written. Paperbound. Slight wear to the edges, else very good in printed wrappers. Illustrated.
